validationErrors.yearAndWeekNumberIsNotProvided: Invalid year and week number. Please check the input data.
validationErrors.timezoneNotYetSet: Timezone is not set yet. Please set timezone first.
validationErrors.menuPublishedAndCanNotBeDeleted: Menu is published and can not be deleted.
validationErrors.weeklyPlanMenuPublishFieldsAreRequired: Weekly plan menu publish fields are required ( year, week, menu ID and publish type ).
validationErrors.menuPublished: Menu is published and this action is not allowed.
validationErrors.clientAssigned: {{client}} is already assigned to the maximum number of weekly menus ({{menuQuantity}}).
validationErrors.groupAlreadyAssignedOnCurrentMenu: Group already assigned on current menu.
validationErrors.weeklyPlanNotFoundOrMenuIsNotAssigned: Weekly plan not found or menu is not assigned.
validationErrors.noClientsAssigned: No clients assigned, therefore the menu cannot be published.
validationErrors.ordersAlreadyStarted_publish: Orders for the respective week's menu have already started, so this menu cannot be published as it would affect already completed orders.
validationErrors.ordersAlreadyStarted_unpublish: Orders for the respective week's menu have already started, so this menu cannot be unpublished as it would affect already completed orders.
